scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:docs" "sleep 3 && npm run show:api-docs"
scripts.setup: concurrently "npm run setup:backend" "npm run setup:frontend" "npm run setup:docs"
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:mongodb: echo 'Checking environment files...' && node scripts/check-env.js && echo 'Importing test data into MongoDB...' && npm run dev:backend & sleep 5 && npm run import:data && pkill -f 'uvicorn main:app'
scripts.setup:complete: npm run setup:all && npm run setup:mongodb
